TopicTitle: Is the Daily Kerbal on Hold?

Articles.Content:
Yesterday there was no modding Monday, the devnotes are already 26 minuets late, the end is neigh.

But seriously, did I miss something or is the daily kerbal on hold or something?

Yesterday there was no modding Monday, the devnotes are already 26 minuets late, the end is neigh.

But seriously, did I miss something or is the daily kerbal on hold or something?

The devnotes never come out at a certain time... Just "on Tuesday."
actually if you check them they all arrive at around 17:02, [sass]so yes they are late[/sass]
I've seen devnotes arrive on a wednesday, so lets not rush them. As long as it isnt just a picture like it was a few weeks ago....
You can put your fears at ease: Today's devnotes are out!
